title: Riangvaite leh hausate u rah thain rah rawh u
lyrics:
Riangvaite leh hausate u, rah thain rah rawh u,
Lalpa hna thawhrimnaah chuan hlau suh u;
Lalpa lo kal hunah lawmman pek tur tiam sa a awm,
A lo hun ni lawm apiangte tan.

Lallukhum ropui ber chu,
Kan chan hun tur ni ropui a hnai tawh;
Lalpa chuan lawmna ber lallukhum a pe ngei ngei ang,
A lo kal hun ni lawm apiangte tan.

Isua chu a hmangaihna hna thawk zo tawhin a chho,
A lo kir lehna ni tinin a hnai e;
Ama mite chu a hmuhin lawmman a pe theuh vang,
A lo kal hun ni lawm apiangte tan.

Aw a eng hmuh hun ni tur chu a va lawmawm dawn em!
Lalber lallukhum ropui chu kan hmuh hunin,
Tlan saten hlimna chu chatuanin an sawi seng lo vang,
A lo kal hun ni lawm apiangte tan.
